title: Comparative Study of Historical Inquiry and Explanatory Learning Using VR Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of World War II and experience using VR devices
context.additional_context: Strengthening spatial reasoning and data analysis skills integrated with mathematics curriculum

learning_goals: Students can explain the spatial context of historical events in three or more ways through VR simulations
The differences in knowledge acquisition effects between exploratory and explanatory learning methods can be compared with 80% accuracy
Project-based assessments enable systematic organization of VR learning experiences into visual reports/presentation materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
